what_went_well: Successful promotion of high-value features to stable.
Stabilized PracticeStore logic which had pre-existing bugs.
Verified UI changes with automated Playwright screenshots.
what_could_improve: Need to be more careful with file overwrites in complex sessions to avoid losing changes.
unexpected_opportunities: Found and fixed several type-mismatches in the exercise definitions during verification.

impact_assessment.user_impact: Dashboard and command assistant are now permanently available, improving navigation and engagement.
impact_assessment.technical_debt_reduction: Removed 2 feature flags and simplified conditional rendering logic across 4 components.
impact_assessment.observability: Initial telemetry implementation allows for data-driven algorithm tuning.
